output_data.clarification_question: What was the total documented time spent providing combined psychotherapy and medication management services for this established patient encounter?
output_data.suggested_answer: 45 minutes (to support CPT 90836, the most common combined follow-up code)?

primary_code.rationale: This code is provisionally selected as the encounter involves integrated assessment, suicide risk review, psychotherapy (addressing guilt/hopelessness), and medication adjustment (*Sertraline* dose increase). Accurate selection of the 30-minute (90833), 45-minute (90836), or 60-minute (90838) combined code is entirely dependent on documented session time (38-52 minutes required for 90836).

output_data.medical_necessity: The established patient presented with worsening symptoms of *Major Depression* (F33.1) including significant functional impairment (missing work), vegetative signs, and passive suicidal ideation. The clinical complexity and necessary high-level intervention (medication titration and risk assessment) support the level of service.
